entries.title: Guardianship Enabled
entries.text: • Each created user has their own guardian that is set by the admin.

entries.title: Profile Page Updated
entries.text: • Updates on stats linking to users.

entries.title: Results Page Updated
entries.text: • Guardianship enforced for editing and removing entries.

entries.title: Meal Entry Updates
entries.text: • Guardianship enforced for submitting new meal logs.

entries.title: List of users page Updated
entries.text: • Admin now has more control to allow management of created users.

entries.title: Members Profile Updates
entries.text:
• - Data linking for profile stats
• - Member automatically created when joining a family or first time login.

entries.title: Profile Pages Updates
entries.text:
• Editable username.
• Linked common meals/meds/allergies.
• Day streak with achievement.

entries.title: Profile Pages
entries.text: • Added profile pages for the users.

entries.title: Ingredients Mapping and Smart Suggestions
entries.text: • Each meal the user inputs will be mapped and ingredients will be suggested to the family members.

entries.title: Local Smart Suggestions
entries.text: • Main meal entry now has local smart suggestions, base for AI training for closed family members.

entries.title: Rewarded Ads
entries.text: • Compare and Summary is now accessible via Rewarded Ads

entries.title: Remove Button on TextEditingControllers
entries.text: • All TextEditingController has been updated with a remove button.

entries.title: Meal Entry Text Count
entries.text: • Entries for meals Main, Sides, Snacks, Drinks and Ingredients text limit increased to 140.

entries.title: Notification Checks
entries.text: • Upon login, app checks if notifications are enabled.

entries.title: Ads Size Adjustment
entries.text: • Ads should now have a proper sizing to easily close the ads.

entries.title: Sorting List of Allergies and Medications
entries.text: • Allergies and Medications now has internal sorting for easier categorization.

entries.title: Results Page Updates
entries.text: • Added a dropdown that contains Level of Rash/Itch/Mood, Body Map and Show Images for a cleaner look.

entries.title: Reviewer Data
entries.text:
• Reviewer user prepared.
• Reviewer data for November and December populated.

entries.title: Interstitial Ads Added
entries.text: • Ads will load after logging a meal.

entries.title: Allergies & Medications list is loaded from Database
entries.text:
• Allergies, medications and reactions list, pulls list from database.
• Cache info based on version.

entries.title: Allergies Updated & TextField constraints
entries.text:
• Allow custom allergies.
• Constraints on all textfields.
• Updated results page viewer and edit mode.

entries.title: Improved Data Caching and Daily Notifications
entries.text:
• Stale data fixed for joined members
• Notification time adjusted
• User Management Updates

entries.title: Improved Image Uploads and  Added Daily Notification
entries.text:
• Images are compressed before uploading.
• Upload overlay is added.
• Images are cached in results page.
• Daily notification with random messages set up.

entries.title: Image Upload Updates
entries.text:
• Image now store in storage
• Able to upload as standalone
• Able to upload as family group (admin/members)
• Images display in results page individually

entries.title: Image upload function
entries.text:
• User is able to upload up to 6 images
• Images are stitched together
• Images now appear in results page

entries.title: Result Page Bug Fixes
entries.text:
• Edit button now loads data from the selected user.
 • Body Map and List of Rash/Itch/Mood renders properly.

entries.title: Invite Family Members
entries.text:
• Users can now invite family members to join the app.
 • Added functionality to manage invited members.

entries.title: Summary Page
entries.text:
• Weekly and Monthly view shows a chart of the itch, rash and mood for a user.
 • Summary is also added to check for common allergens.

entries.title: Compare Meals Page
entries.text: • User can now compare meals between two members for a specific date.

entries.title: Results Page Update
entries.text:
• Added Compare and Summary Buttons. 
• Users can now edit and delete entries from the Results Page.

entries.title: Backend
entries.text:
• Data read/write into firebase.
 • App Integrity Enforcements

entries.title: Google Authentication
entries.text: • Users can now login via Google

entries.title: Edit/Delete Entry Buttons
entries.text:
• Added Delete Entry button.
 • Added Edit Entry Button.

entries.title: Results Page Updates
entries.text:
• Store last user from level of rash page.
 • Update Color of titles.
 • Check last user entry.
 • Clean up data.

entries.title: Results Page Updates
entries.text:
• Bug fixes on displayed data.
 • Clean Results Page display.
 • Added symptoms data from reactions page.

entries.title: Internal Release
entries.text:
• Adjusted saving values to map with meal type.
 • All cards are being displayed in Results page.

entries.title: Important Updates
entries.text:
• Data has been restructured and all saved data pointed to preference_service. - All Pages.
 • Reactions is showing the correct mapping from the user log. - Results Page 2.
 • Meal Log is correctly saved under type of course (Breakfast, Lunch) - Results Page 3. 
 • Meal_Log_Service is completely removed.

entries.title: Issues
entries.text:
• Rash level and Reactions are overwriting data in Breakfast even though entry is under Lunch.
 • Inserting data in medications crashes the app **List dynamic** is not a subtype of **List String**.

entries.title: Meal Log Structure
entries.text:
Example log for 'John Doe' on 2025-11-24```{
  "meals": {
    "breakfast": {
      "boughtOrCooked": "Cooked",
      "main": "Oatmeal",
      "sides": "Banana",
      "snacks": "None",
      "drinks": "Water",
      "ingredients": ["Oats", "Milk", "Honey"],

      "reactions": ["Head", "Arm_L"],
      "symptoms": ["Red patches"],
      "hasReaction": true,

      "allergies": ["Dairy", "Gluten"],

      "medications": ["Hydrocortisone cream"],

      "rash": {
        "rashLevel": 3.0,
        "itchLevel": 2.0,
        "moodLevel": 4.0
      }
    },

    "lunch": {
      "boughtOrCooked": "Bought",
      "main": "Chicken Rice",
      "sides": "",
      "snacks": "None",
      "drinks": "Tea",
      "ingredients": ["Chicken", "Rice", "Soy Sauce"],

      "reactions": [],
      "symptoms": [],
      "hasReaction": false,

      "allergies": [],
      "medications": [],
      "rash": null
    },

    "dinner": {
      "boughtOrCooked": "Cooked",
      "main": "Pasta",
      "sides": "Salad",
      "snacks": "Cookies",
      "drinks": "Juice",
      "ingredients": ["Pasta", "Tomato", "Cheese"],

      "reactions": ["Neck"],
      "symptoms": ["Mild itch"],
      "hasReaction": true,

      "allergies": ["Dairy"],
      "medications": ["Moisturizer"],

      "rash": {
        "rashLevel": 1.0,
        "itchLevel": 1.0,
        "moodLevel": 5.0
      }
    }
  }
}
```

entries.title: Updated Reactions Page
entries.text:
• Added body outline widget to select individual body parts.
 • Selected parts is stored in prefs.

entries.title: Unique Entries
entries.text: • Each meal log entry is now unique to prevent duplicate entries.

entries.title: Create User Page Improvements
entries.text:
• Added list of users into create user page for easier selection.
• Improved layout and design for better user experience.

entries.title: Added List of Users Page
entries.text: • Separated list of users into its own page for better organization.

entries.title: Settings Page
entries.text:
• Added Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions links.
 • Removed list of users from page.

entries.title: Results Page
entries.text: • Redesigned flow and design of the results page for better usability.

entries.title: Next Button Location
entries.text: • Adjusted location of the next button for improved navigation.

entries.title: Renamed Files
entries.text: • Renamed file names for consistency and clarity.

entries.title: Design Updates
entries.text:
• Updated UI elements for better user experience.
• Improved color scheme and typography.

entries.title: Released Internal Testing ver.1.0.0
entries.text:
• Initial testing phase deployed to limited users.
• Collecting feedback on usability and performance.

entries.title: Create User
entries.text:
• First time users greeted with create user page.
 • Scrollwheel birthday selection. 
 • Gender selection. 
• Entry editable from **Settings Page**.

entries.title: User Selection
entries.text:
• Dropdown selection of existing users.
 • Scrollwheel date selection. 
 • Scrollwheel meal selection (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner).

entries.title: Meal Selection
entries.text:
• Breakdown of meal (Main, Sides, Snacks). 
 • Food Name Entry. 
 • Ingredients Entry. 
 • Save Function.

entries.title: Bought or Cook
entries.text: • Bought or Cook options.

entries.title: Settings Page
entries.text:
• Preview list of users. 
 • Edit users.

entries.title: Results Page Setup
entries.text:
• Filter users. 
 • Display Meal Log. 
 • Filter meals.

entries.title: Start Page Setup
entries.text:
• Blockout for the start page.
 • Entry of names.
